translation: With numerous mouths and eyes, with numerous wondrous sights, with numerous divine adornments, with numerous divine weapons uplifted, such a form He showed.
commentary: 11.10 with numerous mouthsand eyes? Anekadbhutadarsanam with numerous wonderful sights? with numerous divine ornaments? Divyanekodyatayudham with numerous divine weapons uplifted.Commentary Countless faces appeared there. Arjuna looked at this Cosmic Form in all its magnificence. He saw the Lord everywhere and in everything. The whole manifestation appeared as one gigantic body of the Lord. He saw the Lord as the goodall.
